Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false --This call will cause a "wait" until the data comes back
-- play sound magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35971258" magicSound.Name = "MagicSound" end magicSound:Play()
wait(.5) rArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rArm == nil then return end armX = rArm.Position.X armY = rArm.Position.Y armZ = rArm.Position.Z
humanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then return end lookAt = (humanoid.TargetPoint - rArm.Position).unit
for i = -1,1 do nextPart = Instance.new("Part") nextPart.Name = "WitchMagic" nextPart.CanCollide = false nextPart.Color = Color3.new(0,1,0) nextPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(armX+2*i,armY,armZ) nextPart.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.5) nextPart.Parent = game.Workspace nextPart.Velocity = Vector3.new(i*10, 0, 0) nextPart.RotVelocity = 50*Vector3.new(math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5) nextPart.BottomSurface = "Smooth" nextPart.TopSurface = "Smooth"
newBF = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") --newBF.velocity = 10*vCharacter.Torso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0,0,-1)) newBF.velocity = 10*lookAt newBF.Parent = nextPart newBF.Name = "MagicGuider"
newBlast = script:FindFirstChild("BlastScript"):Clone() newBlast.Parent = nextPart newBlast.Disabled = false
if (i ~= 0) then
nextPart = Instance.new("Part") nextPart.Name = "WitchMagic" nextPart.CanCollide = false nextPart.Color = Color3.new(0,1,0) nextPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(armX,armY+2*i,armZ) nextPart.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.5) nextPart.Parent = game.Workspace nextPart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, i*10, 0) nextPart.RotVelocity = 50*Vector3.new(math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5) nextPart.BottomSurface = "Smooth" nextPart.TopSurface = "Smooth"
newBF = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") --newBF.velocity = 10*vCharacter.Torso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0,0,-1)) newBF.velocity = 10*lookAt newBF.Parent = nextPart newBF.Name = "MagicGuider"
newBlast = script:FindFirstChild("BlastScript"):Clone() newBlast.Parent = nextPart newBlast.Disabled = false
nextPart = Instance.new("Part") nextPart.Name = "WitchMagic" nextPart.CanCollide = false nextPart.Color = Color3.new(0,1,0) nextPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(armX,armY,armZ+2*i) nextPart.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.5) nextPart.Parent = game.Workspace nextPart.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, i*10) nextPart.RotVelocity = 50*Vector3.new(math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5, math.random()-.5) nextPart.BottomSurface = "Smooth" nextPart.TopSurface = "Smooth"
newBF = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") --newBF.velocity = 10*vCharacter.Torso.CFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0,0,-1)) newBF.velocity = 10*lookAt newBF.Parent = nextPart newBF.Name = "MagicGuider"
newBlast = script:FindFirstChild("BlastScript"):Clone() newBlast.Parent = nextPart newBlast.Disabled = false
end end
--[[local root = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(29100449)
local instances = root:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then root:Remove() return end
root = root:GetChildren() root = root[1] print(root) root.Parent = Tool.Parent ]]-- wait(2.5) Tool.Enabled = true
end
function onEquipped() magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35971258" magicSound.Name = "MagicSound" end
-- newt transform sound is 35971304
end
function onUnequipped() magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound ~= nil then magicSound:Stop() magicSound.Parent = nil end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

spark = script.Parent
local newtSound = Instance.new("Sound") newtSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35971304" newtSound.Parent = script.Parent newtSound.Name = "NewtSound" newtSound.Volume = 1
function onTouch(hit) if spark.Transparency < .2 then return end -- to avoid collisions with creator (unless creator runs into it) if hit == nil then return end if hit.Parent == nil then return end humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then
else -- if this is same as creator, don't newt (for now we just wait 1 second before newt-ing people) -- otherwise, time to get our Newt-On :) if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("NewtOnScript") == nil then newNewt = script:FindFirstChild("NewtOnScript") if newNewt == nil then return end newNewt = newNewt:Clone() newNewt.Parent = hit.Parent newNewt.Disabled = false newtSound:Play() spark.Parent = nil end end end
spark.Touched:connect(onTouch) for i = 1,50 do spark.Transparency = i/50 wait(.1) end spark.Parent = nil

-- Turn them into a newt (and then make them get bettah) -- which basically means turn them invisible and put LizardWrap into their char... maybe attach to torso?
local vCharacter = script.Parent local newtHead = script.NewtOnHead newtHead.Anchored = false -- find the parts charChilds = vCharacter:GetChildren() local partsToHide = {} local numPartsToHide = 0
for i = 1, #charChilds do currChild = charChilds[i] if currChild.className == "Part" and currChild.Transparency < 1 then numPartsToHide = numPartsToHide + 1 partsToHide[numPartsToHide] = currChild end if currChild.className == "Hat" then numPartsToHide = numPartsToHide + 1 partsToHide[numPartsToHide] = currChild.Handle end end
-- fade them out -- faceoff myFace = vCharacter.Head:FindFirstChild("face") if myFace ~= nil then myFace.Parent = nil end
--[[for i = 1, 10 do for j = 1, numPartsToHide do partsToHide[j].Transparency = i/10 end newtHead.Transparency = (10-i)/10 wait(.2) --.08... .5 ... .2 end]]--
for j = 1, numPartsToHide do if partsToHide[j] ~= nil then partsToHide[j].Transparency = 1 end end
newtHeadWeld = Instance.new("Weld") newtHeadWeld.Part0 = newtHead newtHeadWeld.Part1 = vCharacter.Torso newtHead.CFrame = vCharacter.Torso.CFrame*CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2,0,0) newtHeadWeld.C0 = newtHead.CFrame:inverse()*vCharacter.Torso.CFrame newtHeadWeld.Parent = vCharacter
if newtHead ~= nil then newtHead.Transparency = 0 end
--local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm")
--local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
--if rightArm ~= nil then --rightArm.Parent = vCharacter.Parent --end --silly newt, newts can't use items
wait(30) --15
--if rightArm ~= nil then --rightArm.Parent = vCharacter --end -- oh, my mistake; have ur itemz back
-- bring them back --[[for i = 1, 10 do for j = 1, numPartsToHide do partsToHide[j].Transparency = (10-i)/10 end newtHead.Transparency = i/10 wait(.2) end]]--
for j = 1, numPartsToHide do if partsToHide[j] ~= nil then partsToHide[j].Transparency = 0 end end if newtHead ~= nil then newtHead.Transparency = 1 end
if myFace ~= nil then myFace.Parent = vCharacter.Head end
script:remove()

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local humanoid = nil
function onEquipped()
humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
end
function onUnequipped()
if humanoid ~= nil then if Tool.DanceObject.Value ~= nil then Tool.DanceObject.Value:Stop() Tool.DanceObject.Value:remove() end end
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent; local dancer = nil
enabled = true function onActivated() if not enabled then return end enabled = false local humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")
dancer = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.wandswing1) Tool.DanceObject.Value = dancer dancer:Play() wait(3) dancer:Stop() dancer:remove() --root:remove()
enabled = true end
function onEquipped() --Tool.Handle.EquipSound:play() end
function onUnequipped() --Tool.Handle.EquipSound:stop() if dancer ~= nil then dancer:Stop() dancer:remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
